articles.description: Trading at Whitbread, which also owns the Beefeater chain, has been hit by pandemic restrictions.
articles.content:
Hotel and restaurant group Whitbread has asked landlords for a 50% rent cut for the next three months as pandemic restrictions continue to hit trading.
The owner of the Premier Inn, Beefeater and Br… [+2649 chars]

articles.author: Sofia Delgado
articles.title: Covid Tier map with live updates: Which Tier is my area in? - Bournemouth Echo
articles.description: Matt Hancock announced tougher measures for large areas of England. This live map shows all the changes with the latest updates.
articles.content:
Matt Hancock has announced more areas will move to Tier 4 come Boxing Day.
This includes Southampton, but not the New Forest - which will be moved to Tier 3 instead.
This will come into effect at 0… [+754 chars]
